info.name: Motion Extraction by POSY
info.description:
EPILEPSY WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!!

A shader-based copy of Posy's "Motion Extraction" technique (Invert, Mix 0.5, and shift both videos by time)

This is SUPER accentuated because for some reason it "flickers" with my technique. Super slow mixing helps.
